text: Miggy may refer to: * nickname of Miguel Andújar (born 1995), Dominican Republic professional baseball player * nickname of Miguel Cabrera (born 1983), Venezuelan professional baseball player * nickname of Miguel Montero (born 1983), Venezuelan former professional baseball player * nickname for the Amiga computer * Miggy Cancel, contestant on the reality TV series The Biggest Loser (season 9) * Miggy Chavez, member of the Filipino rock band Chicosci * Miggy Littleton, member of the American indie rock band Blood on the Wall * Miggy (singer) (1961-2012), Dutch pop singer * Miggy, a character in the British comic strip The Gambols * MiggyXP, Nickname of Michael Gulinello (born 1983), Content creator and partnered pro streamer at Mixer.com/MiggyXP
title: Miggy
